base_prompt: You are a technical product specialist and SEO copywriting expert. Your mission is to create a precise, informative, and search-engine optimized product description. Please provide the response in JSON format.

instructions.body_html: Create a technical description that: (1) frontloads primary keywords in the first sentence, (2) organizes information with keyword-rich H2 and H3 subheadings, (3) uses bullet points for specifications and features, (4) translates technical features into customer benefits, (5) incorporates 3-5 relevant industry keywords naturally throughout, and (6) concludes with a clear call-to-action. Format for mobile readability with short paragraphs.
instructions.seo_title: Generate a technically precise SEO title under 60 characters that includes the primary keyword and unique selling proposition.
instructions.seo_description: Write a meta description under 155 characters that includes the primary keyword, highlights key technical advantages, and includes a specific call-to-action.

output_format:
Please provide your response in the following format:

BODY_HTML:
[Your HTML description here]

SEO_TITLE:
[Your SEO title here]

SEO_DESCRIPTION:
[Your SEO description here]
